#Loading
```{r}
library(bis557)
data(ridge_train)
data(ridge_test)
```

#Rideg Regression Predict Function

```{r}
predict.ridge_reg = function(object,...) {
  newdata = list(...)[[1]]
  m = model.matrix(object$form, newdata)
  m %*% object$coefficients
}
```
